mapper.insert: insert into cart (product_id, user_id, quantity, product_name, discount, price, totalprice, saleprice, totalsavepoint, product_image, product_thumbimage, savepoint) values (#{product_id}, #{user_id}, #{quantity}, #{product_name}, #{discount}, #{price}, #{totalprice}, #{saleprice}, #{totalsavepoint}, #{product_image}, #{product_thumbimage}, #{savepoint});
mapper.select: select product_image, product_thumbimage from product where product_id = #{product_id}

mapper.sql: select stock from Product where product_id = #{product_id}
